title: Showing Healthy Affection
itunes:author: Guests: Matt & Lisa Jacobson
itunes:summary:
Sometimes, what your son or daughter needs is a hug from you. John and Danny discuss the benefits of hugging your child and offer tips for how to respond when he or she doesn't want one. Featuring Matt and Lisa Jacobson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Matt and Lisa Jacobson's book "100 Ways to Love Your Daughter" or their book "100 Ways to Love Your Son" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-10-07?refcd=1169003

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/showing-healthy-affection/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
